DESCRIPTION: Create a new card from multiple selections of effects and replace this card with it in your hand and deck.
Singed creatures take additional damage when attacked. At the start of their turn, Singe deals damage and is removed.

Provides #yEnergy, #yFireballs, and #ySnowballs each turn, based on its temperature. Temperature ranges from #yFrozen to #yOverheated.
